Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_view.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller for the corresponding Login.fxml file.

    • askNameView

      public void askNameView()
      Sends the server the nickname selected by the user during the login phase.

    • reaskNameView

      public void reaskNameView()
      Sets up the launcher in order to let the user insert again a new nickname, since the previous one was invalid or already taken.

    • askJoiningActionView

      public void askJoiningActionView()
      Sets up the GUI in order to let the user choose whether to create a new game or joining an existing one.

    • displayNoLobbiesAvailable

      public void displayNoLobbiesAvailable()
      Shows an error message on the bottom of the launcher when a user clicks on the 'Join an existing game' button when no lobbies have been created yet.

    • askNumberOfPlayerView

      public void askNumberOfPlayerView()
      Setting up the Launcher in order to let the user choose the size of the lobby (2, 3 or 4 players).

    • changeStateCallback

      private void changeStateCallback(javafx.scene.image.ImageView img, javafx.scene.text.Text txt, boolean switchState)
      Handle the change of state of the CustomSwitch.
      Parameters:
      img - the new image to set (normal game or expert game).
      txt - the new text to set beside the image.
      switchState - the new switch state.

    • askGameTypeView

      public void askGameTypeView()
      Sends a message to the server containing the game type chosen (normal or expert).

    • displayLobbyJoined

      public void displayLobbyJoined(LobbyInfo lobbyInfos)
      Sets up the UI to show the current state of the lobby just joined (number of players, nickname of the partecipants).
      Parameters:
      lobbyInfos - the information about the lobby the player has just joined.

    • populateLobbyMembersObjectsArray

      private List<javafx.scene.layout.HBox> populateLobbyMembersObjectsArray(LobbyInfo lobbyInfo)
      Given the information of a lobby, builds and returns a list of HBox containing a graphical representation of the player nickname for all the lobby participants.
      Parameters:
      lobbyInfo - the information about the lobby.
      Returns:
      a list of HBox of which contains the nickname of a lobby partecipant.

    • askLobbyToJoinView

      public void askLobbyToJoinView(Object listOfLobbyInfos)
      Setting up the GUI to let the user choose the lobby he wants to join.
      Parameters:
      listOfLobbyInfos - a list of information about different lobbies.

    • goBackCallback

      private void goBackCallback()
      Called when the user clicks on the go-back button while choosing a lobby. The player will be asked again to choose a joining action (creating a new game or joining an existing lobby).

    • populateListOfLobbiesArrayObject

      private List<javafx.scene.layout.HBox> populateListOfLobbiesArrayObject(List<LobbyInfo> lobbiesInfos)
      Populate into HBoxes informations regarding the available lobbies on the server.

      Each HBox contains useful information about a lobby, such as the lobby name, the current size over the max size, whether the game is played in expert mode or not and a button to join the lobby if it is not full.

      Parameters:
      lobbiesInfos - the information about the available lobbies.
      Returns:
      a list of HBox containing a graphical representation of the information about the available lobbies.

    • displayOtherPlayerIsChoosingHisDeckType

      public void displayOtherPlayerIsChoosingHisDeckType(String otherPlayerName)
      Displays in the launcher an informative message, saying that another player is choosing his deck type.
      Parameters:
      otherPlayerName - the nickname of the player which is choosing the deck type.

    • askDeckView

      public void askDeckView(List<DeckType> listAvailableDeck)
      Displays all the available decks to the user, to let him choose.
      Parameters:
      listAvailableDeck - a list containing all the available decks the player can choose.

    • setOnDisconnection

      public void setOnDisconnection(String disconnectedPlayer)
      Displays an error message at the bottom of the launcher when a player disconnects from your lobby.
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayer - the player who disconnected and made your lobby to close.

    • getClient

      public Client getClient()
      Returns the client which is using the launcher.
      Returns:
      the client which is using the launcher.

    • setMessageHandler

      public void setMessageHandler(ClientMessageObserverHandler messageHandler)
      Sets the client message handler to the launcher.
      Parameters:
      messageHandler - the client message handler to set.
